message.content:
We must “build” the final accounts receivable number by “adding up” all sale‐transactions (only those on credit) and then “netting” any collections on account. In our situation we have no separate “collection” entries (all “paid” sales were done with cash), so only credit (or “account receivable”) sales remain. 

Looking through the table the only sales with a “receive_method” equal to “Account Receviable” (or similar) are the following transactions. (All the numbers below come from the “after_tax_amount” column, which is what a sale on credit “creates” as an amount due.) We find:

1. Sale20240108016: 528043.87 
2. Sale20240109017: 49628.00 
3. Sale20240112022: 245613.55 
4. Sale20240112023: 130442.28 
5. Sale20240113026: 38159.50 
6. Sale20240114030: 13269.74 
7. Sale20240115032: 58564.91 
8. Sale20240116033: 190976.68 
9. Sale20240118038: 21833.91 
10. Sale20240119041: 46525.66 
11. Sale20240121047: 11470.34 
12. Sale20240122048: 24816.34 
13. Sale20240123049: 113344.29 
14. Sale20240124052: 51125.39 

When we add these numbers together step‐by‐step we get:

• 528043.87 + 49628.00 = 577671.87  
• 577671.87 + 245613.55 = 823285.42  
• 823285.42 + 130442.28 = 953727.70  
• 953727.70 + 38159.50 = 991887.20  
• 991887.20 + 13269.74 = 1,005156.94  
• 1,005156.94 + 58564.91 = 1,063721.85  
• 1,063721.85 + 190976.68 = 1,254698.53  
• 1,254698.53 + 21833.91 = 1,276532.44  
• 1,276532.44 + 46525.66 = 1,323058.10  
• 1,323058.10 + 11470.34 = 1,334528.44  
• 1,334528.44 + 24816.34 = 1,359344.78  
• 1,359344.78 + 113344.29 = 1,472689.07  
• 1,472689.07 + 51125.39 = 1,523814.46

So, the total credit‐sale (accounts receivable) balance rises by 1,523,814.46.

Remember that when using the indirect method of the cash flow statement an “increase” in AR is a use of cash (cash “out”) – and so the line item is reported with a negative sign. Therefore we report:

  (Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable = –1,523,814.46

Thus the final answer in the required JSON format is:

--------------------------------------------------

{"solution": {"(Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable": "-1523814.46"} }
